EmailTemplate.description: This is a notification mail template of Japan TS CSS Approval Process for Submitter when Approvers have Approved
EmailTemplate.name: Japan TS CSS Approved Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Approved - {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Opportunity_Number__c} {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Apttus_Proposal__Proposal_Name__c} {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Name}
